participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about technology, enjoys the thrill of coaching and inspiring others through swimming.
participant_1.background: I am studying to be a computer programmer. I'm a swim coach at my local pool. My mother is very traditional while I prefer to be more free-spirited. My favorite music genre is death metal. My family and I are from India.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Resilient and dedicated, he balances work and parenting while coping with the changes in his personal life.
participant_2.background: I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. What's up? I am a 46-year-old single dad with kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.
